column1:
Overall negative sentiment percentages of Cleaniness, Amenities, Location, Services, and General Value over the years: 

Year 2023: Cleaniness: 0%, Amenities: 0%, Location: 0%, Services: 0%, General Value: 0%

Suggestions on what can be done to improve in each aspect based on the dataframe: 

Cleaniness: Increase cleanliness standards and invest in more quality cleaning supplies.

Amenities: Ensure that all amenities are up to date and maintain regularly.

Location: Research and collect feedback from customers on the local area, so changes can be made accordingly.

Services: Monitor customer service satisfaction levels and invest in customer service training for staff.

General Value: Set competitive prices and offer discounts or other promotions to customers.
